channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Granny Thistle comes to visit and gives Daisy and Poppy a powerful magical wand. The children escape from the castle and. go bananas.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mr Elf is overworked so King Thistle sentences him to a holiday. He isn't too pleased. But Mrs Elf and Ben are overjoyed! Meanwhile, Nanny takes over the food deliveries.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben and Holly visit the bee hive to see how honey is made. Wise Old Elf is the bee keeper and he proceeds to show the children his special way of collecting honey.

channel.desc: When Captain Squid leaves his treasure map in the Little Kingdom, Redbeard the Elf Pirate leads Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum on a treasure hunt.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Leopold has announced he is paying a visit to The Little Kingdom. Everyone is very excited that they have a VIP coming and prepare to welcome him. But King Thistle is feeling left out.

channel.desc: Mr Elf has built a new boat to replace the one Big Bad Barry ate. He is nervous when the king commands him to take them on a cruise to a tropical paradise - will Big Bad Barry strike again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends head to the trampoline park where Miss Rabbit shows them how to bounce. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig and Mummy Sheep decide they want to have a go at trampolining.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy, Daddy, Peppa and George are going to the seaside. Mummy and Daddy explain clouds to Peppa and George who have a little sing and dance about clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle has organised a roller disco for the children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family are visiting an adventure park. Miss Rabbit is in charge, and they have fun working their way around an obstacle course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: For World Book Day, the playgroup must dress up as a character from their favourite book. But Peppa can't decide which as she has so many favourites.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly and Ben think Gaston the Ladybird is sad so they try and cheer him up by tidying his cave. But Gaston liked his cave just as it was - all messy and untidy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly goes with Ben and Mr Elf to the elf farm to collect an egg for the King's breakfast. While there, a huge chicken escapes from the farm and Holly and the elves have to chase it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly spends the day with King Thistle on his royal duties. King Thistle must launch an elf boat, judge a fairy fruit competition and make a speech at the festival.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Pups are going to put on a medieval play in 'Pups Save a Show', and then in 'Pups Save a Ghost', a mysterious ghost is causing havoc around the lookout at night.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Arrby recruits a crew to gather magical seeds in 'Pups Save the Meerkat Pirates', and in 'Pups Save a Hum-Hippo', Mayor Humdinger wants a hippo as his new hench-animal, but it gallops off.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups uncover dinosaur bones in 'The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum', and in 'The Crew Builds A Wheelchair Ramp', Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, so the pups help build some ramps.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: It's Halloween, and when Blaze and his little sister Sparkle hear about a magical Trick or Treat Treasure they set out on a spook-tacular treasure hunt to find it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George and Peppa spend the day playing golf with Grandpa Pig, but they are much more interested in the colourful minigolf course next door.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle and the playgroup are sharing their best nursery rhymes with each other.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr. Potato has come to visit the playgroup and he's brought along his superhero friend, Super Potato.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in, which makes Daddy's shirt pink.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's a lovely day to visit the beach - or it would be, if it wasn't snowing. Miss Rabbit's snow plough saves the day. Mummy Pig goes for a swim, but finds it colder than expected.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to visit a house that Mr Bull is building. Who will their new neighbours be.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig are babysitting. Peppa and George should be fast asleep, but they would much rather play with Granny and Grandpa.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Around the World With Dora
channel.desc: Help World Explorer Taiva and Dora make a Turkish good luck charm and find the tent rocks on your way to a hot air balloon festival in colourful Cappadocia.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger disguises himself to steal a purple pearl in 'Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger', then in 'Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patroller', Moby swipes the Whale Patroller - and the Pups' vehicles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a boy band before the show in 'The Bunny Boyz', then in 'Dancing Osito', Dora gets Isabela's teddy bear back.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Daisy is learning to skateboard in 'Safety Croc', then in 'Good Sport Croc', good sports Mr. Crocodile and Daisy face off in a game of soccer with bad sport Winston.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: An injured baby monkey is rescued in 'The Cat That Roared', then in 'Saving the Safe', Mayor Humdinger rebuilds Meow Meow to break into Mayor Goodway's new safe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia can't decide on the best gift for Grandma.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim fakes it to prove he's just as cool as Kai's cousin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: It's the first day of school in Builder Cove in 'The Crew Builds A School', then in 'The Crew Builds A Waterway', the pups save Farmer Zoe's crops and stop beavers from taking the water.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: Dr. Fuzzleglove accidentally turns himself into a possum in 'Awesome Possum!', then in 'Baby Yoyo!', Bex learns to relax when she babysits the Mayor's daughter with Steve & Stumpy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Daisy is learning to skateboard in 'Safety Croc', then in 'Good Sport Croc', good sports Mr. Crocodile and Daisy face off in a game of soccer with bad sport Winston.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly needs her wand to do magic. But one day Holly loses her wand and is very sad. Ben uses his elf skills to find it again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly invites Ben on the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family go camping. They put up their tent, collect sticks for a campfire and listen to the beautiful sounds of the great outdoors.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig joins with the other mummies to practise fighting fires at the fire station. The fire brigade demonstrate their practice using their motto.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: On a sleepover at the Sheep's house, Peppa and Suzy sit up in bed talking about what they will do when they are grown up.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig requires help in finding his car in the car park.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a fun day in 'Pups Save the Skydivers', then in 'Pups Save the Cupcakes', Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Mini Patrol and the Pups race the rain in 'Pups Save the Chalk Art', then in 'Pups Save the Hot Potato', Farmer Al and Yumi's garden is full of holes and a unique potato is missing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a boy band before the show in 'The Bunny Boyz', then in 'Dancing Osito', Dora gets Isabela's teddy bear back.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her play group are visiting the museum. But not just any museum - it's the Science Museum, where there are lots of buttons to push and things to try out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George have been sailing with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Back at the clubhouse, they discover a jukebox - but it is very noisy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when Mr. Bull arrives to do some noisy work - he is building a windmill, to make electricity! The children join in and make their own windmills too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Today is Mandy Mouse's birthday, and as a special treat, Mandy is going to Cheese World with her friends. It is the most fun ever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is a lovely, sunny day. Peppa and George have come to the seaside. It's a perfect time for everyone to make sandcastles, with a moat, a bridge, and a visitor.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: While the playground is getting rebuilt, Daddy Pig teaches the children some simple science.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's school project time for Peppa and her friends which means they have to build castles and bring them into playgroup.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Police Officer Panda and Police Officer Squirrel have come to teach Peppa and her friends all about bicycle safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle takes the children on a trip to the Zoo where they get a tour from the zookeepers; Mr Lion, Mrs Crocodile and Mr Giraffe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig takes Peppa to the doctors for her yearly health check up with Dr Polar Bear, who checks her height, weight, ears, mouth and heartbeat and more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George sailing, but they keep getting stuck in the mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is Molly Mole's first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben and Holly are excited when they learn that Nanny Plum is a Tooth Fairy at night, and go along with her to pick up a little girl's tooth. But the little girl is not so little.
